inclusion.criterion: an established diagnosis of hepatosplenic schistosomiasis as the cause of portal hypertension
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: a history of UGIB secondary to rupture of esophageal varices, with at least 20 days having elapsed since the most recent episode of bleeding
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: evidence of decompensated liver disease of mixed etiology or of any chronic disease that contraindicated surgery
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: presence of fundal varices on endoscopy
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of UGIB secondary to rupture of esophageal varices, but also has chronic alcoholism and evidence of decompensated liver disease.
